title: Love-Filled Breakfast
detail_text: <:th_ch0205/>....And that’s about it. Now, it’s important to stir it every day. Nukazuke will taste great if you give it plenty of attention.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>I see.... Thank you, Ai-chan. I’ll try my hands at making one!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Okay, Ai hopes it goes well! But you know, what made you want to make nukazuke, Ayumu?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Hmm.... No reason, really. I just wanted to make breakfast that can soothe someone when they eat it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Heeh~, so who’s this “someone”?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>U-, umm, that’s.... Uhh, it’s everyone! I’d love to make it when we do training camps or things like that!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Mhmm, Ai sees, okay then~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>What are you grinning for, Ai-chan~?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Don’t mind me, it’s nothing! Alright then, Ayumu, let’s also find out how to make good miso soup. Ai will help!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Really!? Thank you, Ai-chan! I’ll do my best!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
